channel.title: Mini Game (What wrong with this picture?) Updated!
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]This is a new mini-game I just made up for you guys. [/size]
[size=20pt]Every time someone gets one of my puzzles correctly they will be added to my winners hall of fame. [/size]
[size=20pt]I hope this gets big as I'm thinking of getting it stickied so people can have a relax time every once in a while. [/size]
[center][b][u]Hall of Fame Winners[/u][/b] First Round - deoxys505 Second Round - Newb 2341[/center]
New one on its way.[/center]

P.S. just use this thread, no need to make more posts. besides, i don’t go to general discussion much, and i want to be in the hall of fame a lot…"

item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Inching Away, post:1, topic:96496”][center][size=20pt]This is a new mini-game I just made up for you guys. [/size]

[size=20pt]Every time someone gets one of my puzzles correctly they will be added to my winners hall of fame. [/size]Yay!!! BTW Great idea!! can’t wait for the new one.

P.S. just use this thread, no need to make more posts. besides, i don’t go to general discussion much, and i want to be in the hall of fame a lot…

[size=20pt]I hope this gets big as I’m thinking of getting it stickied so people can have a relax time every once in a while. [/size]

[center]Hall of Fame Winners
First Round - deoxys505
Second Round - Newb 2341[/center]

New one on its way.[/center][/quote]
